title: Analysis | Jeff Merkley’s claims about immigrant children in ‘cages,’ access to a Texas shelter
subtitle: Sen. Jeff Merkley (D-Ore.) said hundreds of immigrant children are locked up in cages in Texas. We investigated.
author: www.washingtonpost.com
vclaim: As the Washington Post has pointed out, in his comments on CNN and on Facebook Live during his visit, Senator Merkley noted that it is HHS’ policy not to allow anyone to visit the detention centers where children are currently being incarcerated. While Administration officials have said that they will site visits to these facilities with two weeks’ notice, they do not say that they will requests with such notice. Senator Merkley’s office is unaware of any such permissions granted to lawmakers (or anyone else) during the Trump Administration or, more specifically, since the enactment of its new “Zero Tolerance” policy for those crossing the border, including asylum seekers.
